channel.title: For two on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in For two on Game6r

item.title: Fireboy & Watergirl 3 In The Ice Temple
item.description: The game for two Fireboy and Watergirl invites you to meet funny characters who went to explore the temple. The boy-fire and the girl-water got into a multi-level room filled with various dangers. You need to move around the location, avoiding traps. For example, water should never enter orange water bodies. They are full of lava, and the water girl will immediately evaporate. In order to overcome difficult places, it is proposed to use various mechanisms.

item.title: Game for two Gravity
item.description: In the process of playing for two players Gravity you need to help the guy rushing forward, avoid all the dangers on his way. Of the controls, only one button is available that changes gravity: you can run both up and down your head. Despite the apparent simplicity of the toy, its levels gradually become very complex.

item.title: Game for two Worms
item.description: The developers of the game for two Worms invite you to visit the world of funny insects. Choose one of the characters and go to the battlefield where the worms are trying to decide which of them is the best warrior in King Worm’s army. Carefully inspect the location and try to quietly get close to your opponents at a grenade throw distance. The authors have created three unique game modes.

item.title: Ladybug Glittery Makeup
item.description: During the game for two Makeup, two pretty girls appear on the screen in front of you. They are preparing for the school ball and can not put themselves in order. Help the beauties apply shadows, tint lips and blush cheeks. Then you need to pick up fashionable hairstyles for your girlfriends and try on ball gowns.

item.title: Worms game
item.description: The playing field is a mountainous area, on one side of which are the fighters of your team, and on the other - the enemy. When making a move, you need to aim and shoot at the enemy. The strategic component of skirmishes is that each character in the team has different characteristics and equipment.
